item.description:
By popular demand - we are officially preparing for the first dancing beer meetup shenanigans festival! I have heard great things about Phoenix Landing and on Friday nights it's a $5 cover charge. Fridays are "Pretty Little Things" with DJ Vinny, spinning old school 80s and top 40 hits. Should be a blast!

Dancing starts at 10 it looks like, but I'm going to try to get my butt in there early - I suggest you do the same. As always, call my cell if you need to find us - 413.695.2121.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be fabulous and shakin' my thang :)
item.name: Dancing at Phoenix Landing
